original_text: There was a written notice above him, which read: this is the king of the jews.
korean_text: 그의 위에 이는 유대인의 왕이라 쓴 패가 있더라

sentences.original_text: There was a written notice above him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 글로 쓴 게시물이 있었고

sentences.original_text: this is the king of the jews
